about_the_game:
Experience real-world live performances in unique virtual venues with Studio 5, powered by Condense.

How it works

Live events will run at selected dates and times posted on our Discord server. When an event is live, you'll get to select an avatar. Then you'll land in one of Studio 5's virtual venues. You’ll be able to move around, explore the venue and interact with other avatars using your keyboard and mouse. Get ready for a live performance like no other!

The performance

Powered by video 3.0 technology, you'll experience a real-world live performance captured as 3D video and beamed straight into a virtual venue. Nothing is pre-recorded. The artist can see everyone when they're performing, so be sure to put on your best dance moves and you might even get a shout out! You can send messages directly to the artist during the performance on our Discord too.

Become part of our community

At Condense, we want to bring the world's live events to virtual spaces, and we want to hear from you. Tell us what you thought about your Studio 5 experience by joining our Discord community.

name: Studio 5

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 or Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i7 or Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Experience real-world live performances in unique virtual venues with Studio 5, powered by Condense. Attend live events as an avatar and interact with performers and other fans in-game.
